broadcast receiver: change service invocation

instead of separate extras, store the cause for the service call into
the extra; also, do not call the service if no connection demanded.

config: monitor server changes

make SmackableImp persist connections

this reverts an old change where a new SmackableImp was created
for each (re)connection, making XEP-0198 impossible in the process.

Now, a cleaner API is introduced, with the aim to allow multiple
SmackableImp instances for different servers to run in parallel.

Update main.xml

improve message parsing, silence XEP-0280 carbons

The parsing of incoming messages / carbons has been streamlined a little
bit, and some code duplication was removed:

* timestamps now parsed from delay extension, carbon, fallback to OS
* incoming carbons now trigger a silent notification (no vibro, no sound)

significant rework of connection state indication

SmackableImp now 'exports' a ConnectionState variable and a last error
string.

XMPPService is using that data to update the notification _and_ to wake
up the UI.

MainWindow is using that data to display the error popup and to indicate
progress.

XEP-0115: implement entity caps w/ local storage

XEP-0092: Software Version implemented

Report app version in reply to version query IQ.

This will report the (translated) app_name string, the long version
number from build_version, including the date, and 'Android' as the OS.

The latter is a violation of XEP-0092 security considerations, however
yaxim is only available on Android, and you can already identify yaxim
based on a `disco#info` query.

Maybe there will be a configuration option to disable that behavior one
day.
XEP-0198: always create StreamHandler with connection
XEP-0280: handle CC'ed delivery receipts

XEP-0198: add requestAck() and isSmEnabled()

Allow the application to request an ack packet. For this, it needs to
know if SM is enabled on the connection.

XEP-0198: add AckReceivedListener interface

With requestAck() and an AckReceivedListener the application can
implement the equivalent of server ping, just with smaller packets and
at a lower level.

bump SDK to r17, include auto-RTL support

This change adds 'start' and 'end' properties to match existing 'left'
and 'right' values, to allow layout mirroring on Right-to-Left devices.

Automatic layout mirroring is supported as of Android SDK r17.

make MainWindow (roster) a singleTask

This changes the Activity stack of Android to only ever allow one
instance of MainWindow in the stack. This should help in situations
where you press 'Quit' and the app or a chat window is still there.

smackable: do not add error stanzas as chat messages

evil (or genius): ignore errors for XEP-0184 acked messages

WARNING! HORRIBLE SIDE-EFFECTS AHEAD!

This change prevents the message state to go ACKED -> FAILED. This is
due to the fact that XEP-0184 ACKs always beat error stanzas (once the
message was delivered, you can't undeliver it!).

This is needed because prosody does not request 0198 ACKs per message,
but instead does bulk requests from time to time. Therefore it is
possible that prosody thinks the messages were not delivered, even
though they were XEP-0184-acked already.

Downgrade libidn because Smart Google Enginieers FUCKED IT UP!

libidn 1.27+ is using a java.util.Arrays function that our beloved
Androiders forgot to implement:

https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=10054

Because they added them with Gingerbread, the compiler won't warn you,
and the app crashes in evil ways on SDK<r9 devices. Thank you so much,
Google!
